name: getHotAddNetwork
description: Retrieve the user-configured network for HotAdd backup and recovery operations on VMware on AWS.

id.description: ID of the vCenter server for which the Rubrik cluster is retrieving the configured HotAdd network information.

$ul: **networkName**: The name of the HotAdd proxy virtual machine network.
**dns_servers**: DNS Servers for the specified IP addresses.
**gateway**: Gateway for the specified IP addresses.
**ip_addresses**: IP addresses and ranges, separated by commas.
**subnet_mask**: Subnet mask for the specified IP addresses.
